page.title: 05THE MALVERN GAZETTE
page.content: { The Malvern Gazette}is one of a number of papers in this area.It has a circulation of 13 500. It is published by {Berrows Newspapers Ltd.}Recently it has changed from a{broadsheet}to a {tabloid.}It should come out on a Thursday but recently it has been late,due to new technology problems. It has an editorial staff of{10, 6 of them are reporters. They get contributions from 32 'Village Corres- pondents",local sport clubs,youth clubs, schools also send in reports. Current issues are: the plight of homeless 18-23 year olds,the increased use of drugs and drink by the youth of Malvern and the need, or not, of a leisure complex. The editor, {Liz Griffin,}wants to have more contribution from children of primary school age,{ANY BRIGHT {IDEAS, KIDS?! }
